name: yhtml5-cli
description: CLI for scaffolding front-end projects based on the create-react-app project.

scripts.git: clear && git status && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.postgit: git pull && git push && git push origin dev:master
scripts.prepublish:yhtml5-test: echo copy... && npm run sync:test && npm run sync:scripts && ls && cd ~/projects/gits/yhtml5-cli/packages/yhtml5-test && pwd
scripts.publish:yhtml5-test: npm version patch && echo npm login https://registry.npmjs.org && npm login && npm publish
